channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 13:55 Air Air In Sumy Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 🔴 13:55 Air Air In Sumy Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Sumy_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
